SELECT NTWRK_ID, NTWRK_IP, GTWY, SUBNET, DOMN_NM_SERVER, (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'COM067' AND CD.USE_AT = 'Y' AND MANAGE_IEM = CD.CODE) AS MANAGE_IEM, USER_NM, USE_AT, TO_CHAR(RGSDE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS RGSDE, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNNTWRKINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND NTWRK_ID = #{ntwrkId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNNTWRKINFO (NTWRK_ID, NTWRK_IP, GTWY, SUBNET, DOMN_NM_SERVER, MANAGE_IEM, USER_NM, USE_AT, RGSDE, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{ntwrkId}, #{ntwrkIp}, #{gtwy}, #{subnet}, #{domnServer}, #{manageIem}, #{userNm}, #{useAt}, #{regstYmd}, SYSDATE, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATE, #{lastUpdusrId})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNNTWRKINFO SET NTWRK_IP = #{ntwrkIp}, GTWY = #{gtwy}, SUBNET = #{subnet}, DOMN_NM_SERVER = #{domnServer}, MANAGE_IEM = #{manageIem}, USER_NM = #{userNm}, USE_AT = #{useAt}, RGSDE = #{regstYmd}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE NTWRK_ID = #{ntwrkId}
